Usage notes: A quote from the teacher him/herself.

Form 2: ++Quote:++ {prefix} “{text}”{' — ' if suffix else ''}{suffix}||{'.' if suffix else ''} Quoted by {teachers}.
Usage notes: The teacher quoting someone else. If the person quoted in a teacher, they should get the first tag.

{teachers} should be the author(s) of the book. Use a Read by annotation to indicate who does the reading. If the book appears in the list of references, {teachers} will be set and " by {teachers}" inserted automatically. If not, plug both in manually along with the hyperlink if relevant.

Form 1: {'Read by ' if text else ''}{text}{'.' if text else ''}||Read by {teachers}.
Usage notes: If the reader is not a teacher, {teachers} should be Anon and {text} specifies the name of the reader.
